channel.title: Count on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Count on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Count Distinct
item.description: In 2017 I blogged about creating custom indexes outside of Cloudant for problems that didn’t fit Cloudant’s indexing engine. One of those was the count distinct problem. Imagine you are recording web events as people (and bots) interact with your website - events that look like this in JSON documents in a Cloudant database: { "_id": "96f898f0f6ff4a9baac4503992f31b01", "_rev": "1-ff7b85665c4c297838963c80ecf481a3", "path": "/blog/post-1.html", "date": "2018-12-04", "time": "17:15:59", "mobile": true, "browser": "Chrome", "ip": "85.
